title: Linear Regression Implementation
description: Implement a basic Linear Regression model from scratch without using major ML libraries like Scikit-Learn to understand gradient descent.
requirements:
1. Implement cost function
2. Implement gradient descent
3. Calculate Mean Squared Error on test data

title: Iris Species Classification
description: Use the Iris dataset to build a classifier that can predict the species based on sepal and petal measurements.
requirements:
1. Data preprocessing
2. Model training (KNN or Decision Tree)
3. Report accuracy and confusion matrix

title: Handwritten Digit Recognition
description: Develop a simple neural network to recognize digits from the MNIST dataset.
requirements:
1. Flatten input images
2. Use ReLU activation in hidden layers
3. Achieve >90% accuracy on test set

title: Global ML Project: Sentiment Analysis
description: Implement a sentiment analysis model using NLTK or Scikit-learn to classify movie reviews as positive or negative.
requirements:
Data Preprocessing (Tokenization, Stopwords removal)
Feature Extraction (TF-IDF or CountVectorizer)
Model Training (Naive Bayes or Logistic Regression)
Evaluation Metrics (Accuracy, Precision, Recall)
